daemon-map/configUrl.description: Url to a remote config. Values from the config file will be overrided by the properties of this component (if defined)!

daemon-map/cssClasses.description: Name of CSS classes to add to the map's HTMLElement. Default CSS class `map` is not removed.

daemon-map/backendUrl.description: Sets the Backend URL address used by this map.

daemon-map/projection.description: Sets map projection (EPSG:CODE). If set, it will override config.map.projection property.

daemon-map/latitude.description: Sets Latitude of map's center. If set, it will override config.map.latitude property.

daemon-map/longitude.description: Sets Longitude of map's center. If set, it will override config.map.longitude property.

daemon-map/zoom.description: Sets map zoom level. If set, it will override config.map.zoom property.

daemon-map/rotation.description: Sets map rotation in degrees. If set, it will override config.map.rotation property.

daemon-map/controls.description: Sets default map controls. If set, it will override config.map.controls property.

daemon-map/interactions.description: Sets default map interactions. If set, it will override config.map.interactions property. Available boolean properties are: altShiftDragRotate, doubleClickZoom, dragPan, pinchRotate, pinchZoom, keyboard, mouseWheelZoom, shiftDragZoom

daemon-map/widgets.description: Sets default map widgets. If set, it will override config.widgets property. There is only one required property - name of the widget.

daemon-map/layers.description: Sets operational layers for this map. If not empty, it will override config.map.layers property. Available boolean properties are: rotate, zoom, attribution, scale, mousePosition

daemon-map/basemaps.description: Sets basemaps for this map. If not empty, it will override config.map.basemaps property.

daemon-map/@config-created.description: Event fired when the config is fetched and ready

daemon-map/@map-created.description: Event fired when the map is created

daemon-map/@map-rendered.description: Event fired when the map is rendered for the first time
